channel.title: Joystick Driven Fire Truck
channel.description:
Here is a link to a Google Drive folder with instructions on how to modify a Firetruck ride-on car to be joystick activated.
![image|432x14](upload://9GR0P71j9kCCVjnITGKamOwFaG9.png)https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B2HJnUrZAwYremFIYW55LVZ2TUU

item.description:
The link was changed by Google, here is the new link: Instructions for building a joystick controlled Go Baby Go firetruck - Google Drive
